title: Local Temperature
tooltip: Read analog data from a temperature sensor. Works with an IoT mobile companion app named "Local Temperature."
description: A simple Node.js IoT app that shows how to read analog data from a temperature sensor and display the results via a mobile app. Data is communicated to the mobile app using a simple web server and WebSockets connection. The IoT mobile companion app is named "Local Temperature" and is a mobile app project that can be found in the "Samples and Demos" section of the "Companion App" part of the "Start a New Project" page (from the Projects tab).
